about_the_game:
Embark on a Journey of Limitless Growth!

What Kind of Game is This?

This is a stage-based vertical screen clicker game! Follow the chaotic and adventurous story of the protagonist "Utah" and his support "Lucca" as they chase their rival "Ciela"! Clear stages to unlock new stages, stories, and skills!

Skill System with Limitless Growth

There are over 40 unique skills with effects like "auto attack" and "increase auto attack speed and damage by 1.5x when defeating rare enemies." Including general skills like "attack power increase" and "critical rate increase," there are over 140 skills in total! Skills can be strengthened using in-game currency "Gems," and these skills can be upgraded indefinitely! Maximize your auto attack skills if you want to master auto attacks, or focus on critical-related skills if you want to specialize in critical hits... Aim for your own ultimate style of play!

Skin System to Color Your Journey

You can change the appearance of the protagonist in the game! Skins can be obtained in connection with skills, so progress through the game to collect many skins! Choose from 11 parts including hairstyles, faces, clothes, and weapons, each of which can be freely colored! You can even change the skin color! Decorate your journey to the strongest with your favorite look!

name: The Mightiest Sword is Mine!

subs.option_text: The Mightiest Sword is Mine! - $2.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy The Mightiest Sword is Mine!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 3215U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A clicker game where you can enjoy limitless growth! Strengthen your skills to embark on a journey aiming for the strongest in your preferred playstyle!
